html:
4.2.20  3:38 pm   Is there any good way to get motivated to do work? 

     yes, you have to understand why you are doing it

4.2.20  3:36 pm   opinion on hot pockets?

     too hot

4.2.20  3:17 pm   Are all the thing you're supposed to do, and the places you're supposed to be, still cancelled

     no

4.2.20  3:14 pm   i want a bill wurtz concert, could that happen?

     yes absolutely

     i can wait

4.2.20  3:06 pm   Are you just 3 kids in a trenchcoat?

     no, i think if that were the case you would be able to see the trench coat

4.2.20  3:03 pm   who did you/are you going to vote for in the democratic primaries?

     i thought everyone dropped out

4.2.20  2:57 pm   man, i wish i knew what you are doing right now in terms of video making...

     i'll give you a hint

4.2.20  2:52 pm   Whats the best way to modulate from C to F#?

     hm, how about like this

4.2.20  2:40 pm   okay bill, it's time to make things right

     that's true

4.2.20  2:29 pm   Can you tell me a profound quote?

     everything is profound. all you have to do is figure out where to put the quotation marks

4.2.20  2:04 pm   what does a garbage disposal sound like

i need it for a song

     like a cross between a car and a truck

4.2.20  1:48 pm   what do you use for your keyboard layout display?

     the 'custom html display' action (in keyboard maestro), the resource xml files, and massive amounts of regex. i made it myself. works very well but the update process is way too slow

4.2.20  1:39 pm   you should change the 240 on your wall to 204

     too late, it's 480 now

4.2.20  1:32 pm   Why must all good things come to an end?

     to try a different good thing

      How can this be stopped?

     avoid any good things

4.2.20  1:29 pm   what do you do in your spear/free time if your not working on a project

     flip out

4.2.20  1:14 pm   ive always wondered how people come up with song titles. do you know what the title is before you write the lyrics, figure it out while writing, or come up with it at the end after seeing all the lyrics?

     all 3 are very good scenarios, each with a different flavour. try them all

4.2.20  1:00 pm   How do you bill wurtz

     you'll see

4.2.20  12:43 pm   if you could acquire a 1 foot long cube of any substance for free what would it be 

     RAM

4.2.20  12:43 pm   do you have any plans of making another video soon?

     oh hell yeah

4.2.20  12:34 pm   i feel like your next video is gonna be something like "hi bye" or some trolling thing like that

     i fail to see how that is a troll, that sounds lovely to me

4.2.20  12:26 pm   how do you deal with the fact that the list of ideas for good things to create will always grow faster than the list of your completed creations?

     try to at least document the journey

4.2.20  12:13 pm   Tips on how to promote your music?

     tell people not to listen to it. a bit of reverse psychology ..... it just might work

4.2.20  12:10 pm   hey i really wanna thank you for inspiring me to make art. your style of videos is so bright and colorful and unique it just makes me wanna draw abuncha psychadellic cats. and your music too, it puts me in a great mood and is legit just epic and aesthetically pleasing in general. im so happy that you exist.

     holy smorgasbord, what a smorgasbord of friendship you have delivered

4.2.20  12:03 pm   What's new with you? 

     i'm stupid

4.2.20  10:45 am   How do you edit your videos

     we'll see

     and/or get inspiration for the songs and visuals?

     inspiration is literally everywhere. you won't believe how excited i was when i realized this

     I love it lmao ☕

4.2.20  10:33 am   what is the best colour

     got to be this one

4.2.20  10:08 am   What food is the most musical to you?

     unbuttered toast

4.2.20  10:03 am   what are your thoughts on god?

     heard of it

4.2.20  9:55 am    how are you so creative?

     i failed the turing test too many times and now i am trying to get revenge

4.2.20  9:38 am   what was the bad thing you did?

     did a thing that was too good

4.2.20  9:27 am   How is self isolation going for you

     fine

4.2.20  8:11 am   I see that you are a philosophical man. Are you the son of Confucius that was able to invent time travel?

     no, but i am pleased to announce that scientists may one day discover that philosophy can exist outside the confucius family

4.2.20  8:09 am   How do I be regular?

     keep a list to remember which pant legs you have put on so far, and which ones you have yet to put on

4.2.20  7:49 am   How can I get as strong as you?

     in some ways you might already be stronger than me

4.2.20  7:30 am   can you correct your spelling in this site 

     i think it's already pretty good

4.2.20  6:18 am   If you say that you make what you want to make and not to suit trends then y did u make an unboxing video

     if you think that's a real unboxing video then why were all the boxes fake

4.2.20  5:56 am   What do your songs mean to you?

     each one is another chance to carry a whole world of meaning. if done properly.....................

      Do they express something you're feeling? Are they a way for your to vocalize something you can't really seem to understand yourself?

     yes and more

4.2.20  5:27 am   How to use a computer

      you could try smiling at it

4.2.20  5:11 am   Was the industrial revolution Truly a disaster for the human race? 

     no

4.2.20  5:04 am   What's your opinion of the kiwi bird?

     never heard of it

     What about the dodo?

     i was going to say it's too small but then i realized i've never heard of it

     
One more thing, do you think the mudskipper is too wet, or not wet enough?

     never heard of it

     Thank you for your feedback.

4.2.20  4:59 am   You have such a weird aura. You are philosophical, yet normal. You're mysterious, yet very open. I cant bring myself to think of you as a human or a mortal.. so what are you?

     person

     (Also I love your music)

4.2.20  4:55 am   Do you think communism will get more populair due to the pandemic?

     possibly

4.2.20  4:52 am   thoughts on bread?

     it was the best thing prior to sliced bread

4.2.20  4:17 am   Do you ever get a break from your own mind?

     no

4.2.20  3:37 am   do you pay much attention to vocal theory/technique (like chest head mix etc) when you sing? or have you ever studied it at all?

     i was never able to comprehend those concepts at all. i must have found a different way

4.2.20  3:18 am   how have you been spending quarenteen

     figuring out how to make videos

4.2.20  2:17 am   hey do you still have that tambourine you saved for later?

     yes, i unwrapped it sometime around 2019

4.2.20  1:13 am   Do a lot of your songs have a theme of growing up?And accepting that you grew up?

     no

     I get that from might quit and the days go on. I especially like the lyric, "look how far I've gone, and i'm right where I belong."

4.2.20  1:13 am   When are you going to post a new video

     i'm having a countdown timer

4.2.20  12:48 am   what is your favorite pasta shape

     cube
